parallel.distributed

Class DBarrierAddRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • parallel.distributed.DBarrierAddRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, DMsgIntf

    public class DBarrierAddRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements DMsgIntf
    implements a DMsgIntf object that asks a DBarrierSrv to add the corresponding thread to its pool of participants in the DBarrier. Not for use as part of the normal public API.

    Title: popt4jlib

    Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

    Company:

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ioannis T. Christou
